name: sack
openDesc: Opening the sack reveals a lunch, and a clove of garlic.
useDesc: What the heck! You won't make friends this way, but nobody around here is too friendly anyhow. Gulp!

name: bottle
description: A glass bottle is sitting on the table containing a quantity of water.
useDesc: Thank you very much. I was rather thirsty ( from all this talking, probably).

name: leaflet
contents:
WELCOME TO ZORK!

ZORK is a game of adventure, danger and low cunning.
In it you will explore some of the most amazing territory ever seen by mortals.
No computer should be without one!

name: mat
specialDesc: A rubber mat saying 'Welcome to Zork!' lies by the door.

name: egg
specialDesc: In the birds nest is a large egg encrusted with precious jewels, apparently scavenged by a childless songbird. The egg is covered with fine gold inlay, and ornamented in lapis lazuli and mother-of-pearl. Unlike most eggs, this one is hinged and closed with a delicate looking clasp. The egg appears extremely fragile.
useDesc: The egg glimmers, blinds you, and you fall to the ground.

name: grating
specialDesc: On the ground is a pile of leaves.
useDesc: You place the grating on the ground. Great...

name: elven sword
specialDesc: Above the trophy case hangs an elvish sword of great antiquity.
openDesc: You pull the elven sword from your bag and hold it high in the air. It glows with a mystical aura.

name: brass lantern
specialDesc: A battery-powered brass lantern is on the trophy case.
useDesc: The brass lantern is now on.
